name: Disable FLoC Easily
author: WebsiteGuider

sections.description:
FLoc is a new surveillance method introduced by Google. It allows Google to track your data anonymously. Based on the data, you will be served ads.

Suppose you are looking for a simple solution to block FLoC at the server level. Then this plugin will help.

We took help from the WordPress filter so that we can add the Header to the headers list.

If you don’t want to install the plugin and do it without it. You can follow this tutorial.
How To Block Google’s FLoC in WordPress?

Please let us know in the support section if you are having issues with any theme or plugin to serve you in a better way.

1.2

  • Added a dedicated settings section inside Settings>>Disable FLoC
  • Added Apache method
  • Removed ‘Inc’ folder

1.1

  • Added new folder ‘inc’
  • Improved code and validation

1.0

  • Initial Release
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload disable-floc-easily folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or install it from WordPress Repository.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Is there any settings page inside the dashboard?

Yes, you get a dedicated section where you can manage the plugin settings.

How will you block/disable FLoC

The plugin will add Header ‘interest-cohort-()’ to response headers. This plugin offers you two methods to do that, first is by filter method and other is by .htaccess.

Do I have to flush rewrite rules

We recommend to use ‘filter’ method. Otherwise you don’t need to flush rules manually because the plugin does it for you automatically when you set the apache method.
